explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of instance-based entropy fuzzy support vector machine (IEFSVM) for loan status prediction, which is a machine learning technique.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper focuses on classification and regression tasks, which are supervised learning methods.
explanations.classification: The paper uses IEFSVM to classify loans as fully paid or default, which is a classification problem.
explanations.regression: The paper also provides a multiple regression model to generate an investment portfolio based on non-default loans.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper proposes a modified version of the entropy fuzzy support vector machine (EFSVM) called IEFSVM for loan status classification.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for support vector machine, which is the main technique used in the paper.
